topic.topicDialog: When students are set up on Kerboodle, they are not given access to a Kerboodle Book or Course automatically; this is done using Teaching Groups.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Teaching Groups button.
Click on the Create a New Teaching Group button.

In the pop up window which appears, add a group Name and Description.

Tick the box next to the name of any Books or Courses that you wish this group to access.

Use the Filter and/or Search facility to find the Teachers* you want to add to the group and tick the boxes next to their names. Then click Save.

*Students can add themselves to the group later using Group Code.
Enter a Group Code for your Teaching Group. Then click Finish

The Teaching Group will then appear in the My Teaching Groups list.

Students can then use the Group Code to assign themselves to the Teaching Group, please see the tutorial called Students view of Group Code for full details.
